data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=kmrOrz8lpXAQ7kNvgFVLnuL&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD6cuMrgfU782_F1iawJPrdNMuFxfx9qm2AuijR9oHFVg&oe=67067D0C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=f71e9Tcd-LwQ7kNvgFYV5Wf&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBrZegHXsFeFR0k7M6VNoO9DrqNWc56IJXJIQwerehmyQ&oe=67067B1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tCKwE6ksjJsQ7kNvgFH250N&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDmpW-olCYmQbcWWeDjZmsXpZcJ34Z4j6g3qZoJLs-iCA&oe=67066071)
